scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && python -c "import re; f=open('pyproject.toml', 'r'); content=f.read(); f.close(); version=re.search('version = \"([0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+)\"', content).group(1); parts=version.split('.'); parts[2]=str(int(parts[2])+1); new_version='.'.join(parts); f=open('pyproject.toml', 'w'); f.write(re.sub('version = \"[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\"', f'version = \"{new_version}\"', content)); f.close(); print(f'Updated pyproject.toml version to {new_version}')"
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && python -c "import re; f=open('pyproject.toml', 'r'); content=f.read(); f.close(); version=re.search('version = \"([0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+)\"', content).group(1); parts=version.split('.'); parts[1]=str(int(parts[1])+1); parts[2]='0'; new_version='.'.join(parts); f=open('pyproject.toml', 'w'); f.write(re.sub('version = \"[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\"', f'version = \"{new_version}\"', content)); f.close(); print(f'Updated pyproject.toml version to {new_version}')"
scripts.version:major: npm version major && python -c "import re; f=open('pyproject.toml', 'r'); content=f.read(); f.close(); version=re.search('version = \"([0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+)\"', content).group(1); parts=version.split('.'); parts[0]=str(int(parts[0])+1); parts[1]='0'; parts[2]='0'; new_version='.'.join(parts); f=open('pyproject.toml', 'w'); f.write(re.sub('version = \"[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\"', f'version = \"{new_version}\"', content)); f.close(); print(f'Updated pyproject.toml version to {new_version}')"
scripts.publish:patch: npm run version:patch && npm run build:package && npm run check:package && npm run publish:pypi
scripts.publish:minor: npm run version:minor && npm run build:package && npm run check:package && npm run publish:pypi
scripts.publish:major: npm run version:major && npm run build:package && npm run check:package && npm run publish:pypi
